title: PS4 Back Button Attachment Coming In January - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.17.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/games now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Get 10% off all Logitech G products with promo code KFGAMES at http://logitechg.com.

Imran and Fran discuss PS4 Back Button Attachment, Xbox Series X Name, and more! 

Time Stamps - 
00:03:40 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:5:00 - PS4 Back Button Attachment coming in January, adds programmable paddles (Charlie Hall @ Polygon)
00:16:30 - Xbox Series X Name Explained By Microsoft (Matt Kim @ IGN)
00:20:30 - With the ecosystem being Xbox and the actual box being series x(?) do you think this confirms two consoles for launch? - Frankfurtter
00:36:40 - The Outer Worlds Story DLC Coming In 2020 (Steve Watts @ Gamespot)
00:43:00 - Brendan "PlayerUnknown" Greene's Next Game, Prologue, Is Not A Shooter (James O’Connor @ Gamespot)
00:53:00 - Out today
:: -  - Best Friends Q
00:56:45 -  Ad  
 Reader mail   -
01:02:15 - The Nano Biologist - “people seem to always be forgetting is Dragon Ball Z Kakarot, a game that's being released January 17th. While it's not in the major shitstorm of game releases that will ultimately have us all end up bankrupt, why is nobody mentioning this great looking DBZ RPG? “
01:07:33 - BJ Bernardo - 2019 In Gaming 
01:11:07 - Squad Up: Chandler - Stadia - Allfer2 - “I started playing Destiny 2 when Stadia launched last month, and it turns out I really like Destiny 2. I played the Red War campaign and did some strikes to get my power level up to 900, and now I'm working on the grind from to 950. If any wants to do weeklies together, or try to do some of the older raids or Nightfall Ordeals, hit me up. I live on the west coast and play most evenings.”
01:13:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Victor Lucas
FRIDAY: Greg and Fran (11 am show!)
GAMESCAST: Thursday,  @ 2 p.m.
Tim, Greg, Fran, Imran
